alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 02 at 12:34AM PST until December 03 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40-45 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45-50 mph possible. * WHERE...In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area, Central Willamette Valley and South Willamette Valley. In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, 2 AM until 10 AM PST this morning. For the High Wind Watch, from late tonight through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
